skip_reason: Perfect score (5/5) - this critique type skips perfect scores

source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a static, scenic shot of a tropical location at sunset or sunrise. The camera remains still, capturing a row of silhouetted overwater bungalows against a colorful sky. The calm water reflects the scene, with mountains visible in the distance.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a static, scenic shot of a tropical location at sunset or sunrise. The camera remains still, capturing a row of silhouetted overwater bungalows against a colorful sky. The calm water reflects the scene, with mountains visible in the distance.
